EmailTemplate.description: change of date from 26 nov to 20 nov
EmailTemplate.name: HOS 26 nov change of date
EmailTemplate.subject: Another School Tour change of date: now THURSDAY 20 NOVEMBER
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
I do apologise, however due to demand, we are have to bring our Head of School Tour forward from Wednesday 26 November to Thursday 20 November.
The tour times remain the same - from 9.00am to 10.30am.
I do apologise for any confusion or inconvenience! We will be in touch again closer to the date to remind you and provide further details.
We look forward to welcoming you and your family to St Andrew's Cathedral School.
Kindest regards
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Administrative Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
direct 9286 9552 mobile 0404 884 852 email RPedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
